attributes.action: Stop letting unskilled foreigners into the country to takes our houses,jobs and benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we do not close the country to unskilled foreigners,taxes will continue to rise at high rates to cover to pay for them,the benefits they claim,the health service they get from us and the families they send money back to in their home countries

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
